com.shizhefei.db.sql

类 FindSql

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shizhefei.db.sql.Sql
      • com.shizhefei.db.sql.FindSql
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IFind, ISelect, ISql, IWhere

    public class FindSql
extends Sql
implements ISelect, IFind, IWhere
    带有查询方法的sql
    特别注意该类用了装饰模式，所以父类的所有方法都要重写一遍
    作者:
    试着飞
    Date: 13-11-18

      • where

        public FindSql where(java.lang.String columnName,
            java.lang.String op,
            java.lang.Object value)
        从接口复制的说明: IWhere
        where(“age”, "=", 1) 表示sql的 where age = 1;
        where(“age”, "!=", 1) 表示sql的 where age <> 1;
        where(“age”, "<>", 1) 表示sql的 where age <> 1;
        where(“name”, "like", "张_") 表示sql的 where name like '张_';
        where(“name”, "like", "%三") 表示sql的 where name like '%三';
        where(“age”, "in", new int[]{1,2,3})或者where(“age”, "in", list) 表示sql的 where age in(1,2,3);
        where(“age”, "betteen", new int[]{1,10})或者where(“age”, "in", list) 表示sql的 where age betteen 1 and 10;
        指定者:
        where 在接口中 IWhere
        op - operator: "=","<","!=","<>","LIKE","IN","BETWEEN"...
        返回:
        IWhere

      • and

        public FindSql and(java.lang.String columnName,
          java.lang.String op,
          java.lang.Object value)
        从接口复制的说明: IWhere
        and(“age”, "=", 1) 表示sql的 and age = 1;
        and(“age”, "!=", 1) 表示sql的 and age <> 1;
        and(“age”, "<>", 1) 表示sql的 and age <> 1;
        and(“name”, "like", "张_") 表示sql的 and name like '张_';
        and(“name”, "like", "%三") 表示sql的 and name like '%三';
        and(“age”, "in", new int[]{1,2,3})或者where(“age”, "in", list) 表示sql的 and age in(1,2,3);
        and(“age”, "betteen", new int[]{1,10})或者where(“age”, "in", list) 表示sql的 and age betteen 1 and 10;
        指定者:
        and 在接口中 IWhere
        op - operator: "=","<","!=","<>","LIKE","IN","BETWEEN"...
        返回:
        IWhere

      • or

        public FindSql or(java.lang.String columnName,
         java.lang.String op,
         java.lang.Object value)
        从接口复制的说明: IWhere
        or(“age”, "=", 1) 表示sql的 or age = 1;
        or(“age”, "!=", 1) 表示sql的 or age <> 1;
        or(“age”, "<>", 1) 表示sql的 or age <> 1;
        or(“name”, "like", "张_") 表示sql的 or name like '张_';
        or(“name”, "like", "%三") 表示sql的 or name like '%三';
        or(“age”, "in", new int[]{1,2,3})或者or(“age”, "in", list) 表示sql的 or age in(1,2,3);
        or(“age”, "betteen", new int[]{1,10})或者or(“age”, "in", list) 表示sql的 or age betteen 1 and 10;
        指定者:
        or 在接口中 IWhere
        op - operator: "=","<","!=","<>","LIKE","IN","BETWEEN"...
        返回:
        IWhere

      • where

        public FindSql where(java.lang.String expressions,
            java.lang.Object[] values)
        从接口复制的说明: IWhere
        where("age = ? and ( name = ? or name = ?)",new Object[]{1,"试着飞","小凡"})
        表示 where age = 1 and ( name = '试着飞' or name = '小凡' )
        指定者:
        where 在接口中 IWhere
        返回:

      • select

        public FindSql select(java.lang.String... columnNames)

        select("age","name")表示
        "select age,name from table";

        select("count(*) as num")表示
        "select count(*) as num from table";
        指定者:
        select 在接口中 ISelect
        返回:

      • where

        public FindSql where(java.lang.String expressions)
        从接口复制的说明: IWhere
        where("age = 1") 表示 where age = 1
        尽量调用IWhere.where(String, Object[]) 用？占位符设置条件的值，这样避免手动拼接sql语句，以及能够正确的将java的值转化为数据库的值。
        以上可以转化为 where("age = ？"，new Object[]{1}) 表示 where age = 1
        指定者:
        where 在接口中 IWhere
        返回:

      • select

        public FindSql select(IFunction... functions)
        指定者:
        select 在接口中 ISelect
